cause.description:
The Association of Christian Community Computer Centers (AC4) is a program of TechMission to support any program using technology to serve at-risk communities. AC4 membership provides benefits and resources to all urban ministries. Member Benefits Include: TechMission’s Tech Program Manual, Tech Curriculum, training and conference materials, regional chapters, E-mail lists/archives, a CD of Free Software and Program Materials, a free online subscription to Christian Computing Magazine and other discounts.
1. Techmission.org
2. Addressing the digital divide.
cause.mission: TechMission AC4 works to bridge the digital divide in under resourced communities.
cause.name: Addressing the Digital Divide
